text:
Remote: Accountant and Lawyer for rapidly growing freelance practice and startup(s). [USA]

The job: Help me with my fast growing freelance practice and startup(s). To give you an idea, the practice just grew 230% in the last month. Startup(s) are getting traction at around 2.1% conversion rate. Internation experience (Europe) is a big plus.

What I need: To get things set up properly.

Experience with startups is very important. Flexible and able to explain things like I'm five.

Email in profile. Look forward to hear from you.
